00041 RectangularConstraint_ZMP::RectangularConstraint_ZMP(const double *d_)
00042 {
00043     D[0] =  1.0; D[4] =  0.0;
00044     D[1] =  0.0; D[5] =  1.0;
00045     D[2] = -1.0; D[6] =  0.0;
00046     D[3] =  0.0; D[7] = -1.0;
00047 
00048     d[0] = d_[0]; 
00049     d[1] = d_[1]; 
00050     d[2] = d_[2]; 
00051     d[3] = d_[3];
00052 
00053     Constraints2Vert(); // determine coordinates of vertices
00054 }

00068 void RectangularConstraint_ZMP::rotate_translate(const double ca, const double sa, const Point2D& p)
00069 {
00070     // D = D*R'
00071     D[0] =  ca; D[4] =  sa;
00072     D[1] = -sa; D[5] =  ca;
00073     D[2] = -ca; D[6] = -sa;
00074     D[3] =  sa; D[7] = -ca;
00075 
00076     // d = d - D*p
00077     d[0] += D[0]*p.x + D[4]*p.y;
00078     d[1] += D[1]*p.x + D[5]*p.y;
00079     d[2] += D[2]*p.x + D[6]*p.y;
00080     d[3] += D[3]*p.x + D[7]*p.y;
00081 
00082     Constraints2Vert(); // determine coordinates of vertices
00083 }

00097 void RectangularConstraint_ZMP::Constraints2Vert()
00098 {
00099     double det;
00100     vert.clear();
00101     
00102     // Indexes of ctr.D
00103     // 0 4
00104     // 1 5 
00105     // 2 6
00106     // 3 7
00107 
00108     //   D     d       inv (D)
00109     // |0 4|   0    1/det * | 7 -4|
00110     // |3 7|   3            |-3  0|
00111     det = D[0]*D[7] - D[3]*D[4];
00112     vert.push_back(Point2D( D[7]/det*d[0] - D[4]/det*d[3],-D[3]/det*d[0] + D[0]/det*d[3])); 
00113     
00114     // |0 4|   0     | 5 -4|
00115     // |1 5|   1     |-1  0|
00116     det = D[0]*D[5] - D[4]*D[1]; 
00117     vert.push_back(Point2D( D[5]/det*d[0] - D[4]/det*d[1],-D[1]/det*d[0] + D[0]/det*d[1])); 
00118     
00119     // |1 5|   1     | 6 -5|
00120     // |2 6|   2     |-2  1|
00121     det = D[1]*D[6] - D[5]*D[2]; 
00122     vert.push_back(Point2D( D[6]/det*d[1] - D[5]/det*d[2],-D[2]/det*d[1] + D[1]/det*d[2])); 
00123     
00124     // |2 6|   2     | 7 -6|
00125     // |3 7|   3     |-3  2|
00126     det = D[2]*D[7] - D[3]*D[6]; 
00127     vert.push_back(Point2D( D[7]/det*d[2] - D[6]/det*d[3],-D[3]/det*d[2] + D[2]/det*d[3])); 
00128 }
